unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Choosing Tickets with Replacement
question_text: A charity group decided to hold a raffle with $1{,}000\text{ tickets}$ in a large bin. Of the $1{,}000\text{ tickets}$ , $150$ are winners. If tickets are chosen with replacement, what is the probability a winner will be chosen by the fourth trial?
